mapper.insert: INSERT INTO public."providerHistory"( "reqDate", runtime, "resCode", "apiCode", "regularTransmission", "uniqueNum", "statusInfo", "apiResources", "reqHeader", "resMsg", "resData", "customerNum", "reqInfoId") VALUES (NOW(),#{runtime},#{resCode},#{apiCode},#{regularTransmission},#{uniqueNum},#{statusInfo},#{apiResources}, to_json(#{reqHeader}::json),#{resMsg}, to_json(#{resData}::json),#{customerNum},#{reqInfoId});

INSERT INTO public.data( "requestData", "responseData", uri, "apiId", "clientNum", industry) VALUES (to_json(#{requestData}::json), to_json(#{responseData}::json), #{uri}, #{apiId}, #{clientNum}, #{industry});
